name: Warhammer: Mark of Chaos
description:
Warhammer: Mark of Chaos is a strategy game developed by Black Hole Entertainment. It came out on 14-11-2006. It was published by BANDAI NAMCO Entertainment US. On review aggregator Metacritic, Warhammer: Mark of Chaos has a score of 73. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Warhammer: Mark of Chaos is available on PC.
It was scored by Jeremy Soule.
